title: 3 Scalable Crypto Alternatives: Near Protocol, Solana And Quitriam Finance (qtm) | Mint - Mint
content: 3 Scalable Crypto Alternatives: Near Protocol, Solana And Quitriam Finance (qtm) | Mint  Mint
description: Looking for a coin that mitigates the problem of scalability will be necessary for investors. Quitriam Finance (QTM) has stated that it can handle this problem, and its presale has shown that it has even more potential for profit.
